thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Phil Henry

author: Phil Henry
title: Phil Henry
text: We're on house sit number 11 of 14 arranged by being members of Trustedhousesitters and we're having a great time. In the 5 months of travel so far we've been to 5 European countries and have two more to go. The site is easy to use and the notifications of potential house sits work flawlessly. Any questions we've had have been answered quickly and completely by the online staff. We have never done this before but we are now committed house sitters or should i say Trusted house sitter and will be doing for years to come.
